name: Grand Theft Auto 3 Saved Game File

description: GTA3 saved games are stored in a subdirectory of the My Documents folder by default. For example, GTA3: San Andreas saves "B" files in the following directory:
C:\​Documents and Settings\​[username]\​My Documents\​GTA San Andreas User Files\​

common_filenames.description: GTASAsf2.b - Name of a GTA3 saved game in the second game slot. GTA3 B files follow the naming convention of game title, "sf", and game slot number.
